replies.body: BRING BACK U.R.F. MODE!

FIX PURPLE SIDE CAMERA 1ST BEFORE FEEDING THE NEWCOMERS.
THE CAM LOCK AND SPACEBAR ON PURPLE DOES NOTHING, HOW THE HECK ARE WE SUPPOSED TO PLAY RANGED ON PURPLE SIDE IF ALL WE CAN SEE IS FOG OF WAR AND THE TURRET ABOVE US, THERE'S HUD AT THE BOTTOM OF THE SCREEN, I DON'T WANT A (&i*??$%&?*() FLIP CAMERA I JUST WANT IT TO BE FOCUSED LOWER BECAUSE OF THE FORSAKEN SPELLS AT THE BOTTOM OF THE SCREEN WHERE WE CAN'T SEE MINIONS THRU THE HUD
YOUR CAPS LOCK APPEARS TO BE BROKEN
IT LOOKS LIKE IT'S WORKING PERFECTLY TO ME.
WHAT LOOKS PERFECTLY FINE? {{champion:64}}
IT'S A GOOD THING LEE SIN CAN READ, THEREBY ALLOWING HIM TO REPLY TO THAT COMMENT {{champion:48}}
Not knowing that most computers are equipped to read pages for the blind and poorly sighted
HE WANTS SENPAI TO NOTICE HIM

#noticed 
{{champion:98}}
DON'T YOU MEAN SHENPAI?{{champion:98}}
Wow you're a nerd

> Wow you're a nerd  

Aren't we all now get out of here and stick to playing {{champion:17}}
I hardly ever play league so no go away
Level 30, Post on every single blog with toxic remarks, knows about league, who in the world are you kidding?
{{champion:33}} Ok
they  are fixing it with the new SR VU shut up pls ffs purple side isnt a issue at all stop playing locked ._.
Doublelift plays with locked camera lol.

OK, I am going to say this as definitively as fucking possible. IT IS NOT ABOUT LOCKING THE CAMERA! Even with it UNLOCKED, the HUDs still block MORE of the forward vision for red side than blue side. If that old mod could flip the camera, than rito can. If you don't want it flipped, it could be an OPTION. STFU about the raging at "bad" players locking their screen whenever this UNRELATED issue is brought up.
He centers his camera during teamfights.

Here is a suggestion for Rito to make everyone happy. Camera Rotation. Think about it, have you ever wanted to see it from a different view? An example; You are best on Blue team but you are on Purple/Red team? Why not allow a player to turn the camera when playing as if they are on Blue team? Again it's an suggestion and not even 1% happening, but if we can get more players to up this, we could make it happen. **Let our voices be heard**. Or not and ignore this.
Do you know how annoying it is to repeatedly adjust the fucking camera just so I can last hit a canon minion. ._.

only thing about the purple side . Is it at anyway possible to flip abilities spells and map to the top of the screen? It would help bot lane and mid lane to make it a more evenly competition. As with wards vision counts alot and purple side is at an extreme disadvantage to have to push to see the champs they are laned against to get ganked  . Only vision is based on map icons that u have to make a lottery skill shot to be effective into pushin off turret.
Mid lane is fine IMO but bot lane...

lock screen and playing on free camera is all based on the player preferences  no one is better then the other.
I play on lock screen because it helps my farm and i can tell a team fight may happen because the game gives us a mini map to look at other places on the map
purple is an issue.. In 10 million games played blue had a 55% win rate at all levels compared to purple. Thats pretty big.

Well maybe it's not a problem for you but many people have problems playing with an unlocked camera. The game should be made easier to play for those that play with locked AND unlocked camera. Players should be allowed to choose which feels more comfortable for them. Not everyone is an RTS junky.
They are bringing back U.R.F mode, in 2015. (Next year.) "Good things, come to those who wait."
rito saded that this was this is just a test because the is the evolution the glores revolution
Rito said to improve your spelling.
I'm crying with laughter.
Shut the fuck up with URF already. Like it was fun seeing evelyn maokai zed and the same shit every game. Let Riot experiment with new modes, don't interfere with the creative process.
Enough with these comments, this has nothing to do with the topic at all. This isn't the way to get your not so well thought out opinions out there.

If I may make a suggestion. A Kills heat map sounds like an amazing idea, but on the same topic, a warding heat map would also be amazing tool for new players, especially in conjunction. 

Players will directly see how their warding effects kills and deaths in a match, and see how the best ranked players decide to ward and clear wards with higher accuracy.
this has been the only decent suggestion on this entire thread.
Please make it so we watch our games as well as look at the stats
no that would take way too much space

"Match Replays" would be nice. It is a feature that Blizzard's StarcraftII has available. I suppose it's possible that much of that data is saved onto individual's hard drive memory rather than server based, which of course will be the source of our match history here. Would it really be too much to even save it in a compressed format?
League should use the Dota 2 system. They keep the match for a week, and if you want to keep it, you can download it off the server onto your computer.
If they're worried about the memory, they could just do it for 3 days instead of a week. I'd still use this feature if they made it that short.

Going off of akajoe1234 and Fiddlesnout's comments, why not? Going even further on Fiddlesnout's comment, why even go for 3 days? If memory's their main concern, make it stick for 6 hours with the option to download. Then it's the player's problem to worry about memory, and there's a decent window to decide to download the game data. Honestly, it's not like I'm sitting there, 3 days later, thinking, I wish I could watch that game again... IF that ever happens, the game in question is likely one that I would've wanted to DL immediately, anyway.
If they only keep it for 12 hours I'd use it.
They just have to only make it available for a short time and you can get the game ID and download it if you want. At least thats what makes the most sense
Let games be recorded so we can watch them later.
PBE actually was testing that recently

That, and I wish there was a **"Damage Mitigated"** stat...That way there's at least one valuable post-game stat for the team tank. I like stats, and seeing how effective my armor/mr actually were, would go a long way :)

Don't get me wrong, it's still cool to see how much damage you took...but it could mean you played either great *or* awful.
I'm a Janna main and sure I can do quite a bit of healing with my ult but what I really want to know is how many hundreds of thousands of shield damage I negated for my team.
Are we finally going to see the duration of our games in match history? Currently only available on websites.

Please provide like a Lol Replay system so we can watch our replayed games through our match history instead of having to run a background program. Also it would be awesome if inside the death locations you place a suggested ward spot to statistically prevent the death. Thanks for reading :)

Thank you Riot for this new accessory to enhance our gaming experience. Recently there has been a large effort in communicating with your audience on how to improve this game and it is much appreciated. In my own opinion I can only see a upgrades in the foreseeable future. So.. continue supporting this community. Thank you :)
